user_query: that there can be three different forms of singularity inside a black hole. The first of them is BKL singularity. The singularity of the point formed early in the black hole is very unstable. Therefore, when something comes inside, it undergoes a huge change. This is the BKL singularity, which exists the deepest inside the black hole. Once getting here, Cooper's definitely not going to survive. Over time, black holes can devour more things, and there can be another singularity. Behind Cooper, numerous particles fall very quickly, which can distort spacetime again. The singularity that forms like this is called infalling singularity. The last singularity is called outflying singularity. Some of the particles that fall into the black hole before Cooper can scatter upward and form thin layers. If it's an old black hole, these two more singularities can be created, and if you meet them, you're likely to survive. Cooper falls faster than infalling singularity as he enters Gargantua, and manages to escape just before meeting outflying singularity. Cooper now enters the cube near outflying singularity. The cube, as TARS says, is a place where time exists in one physical dimension. To understand that, let me first talk about how to express the dimension of time. Scientists use some tricks to visualize spacetime together. Because the space we live in is three dimensions, so it is hard to imagine adding the dimension of time. To do this, we first compress the space into two

entities.entity_description: 쿠퍼는 블랙홀 가르강튀아에 진입하여 특이점들을 통과하는 인물이다. 인폴링 특이점보다 빠르게 낙하하고 아웃플라잉 특이점을 만나기 직전에 탈출하여 큐브에 진입한다
타스는 쿠퍼에게 큐브가 시간이 하나의 물리적 차원으로 존재하는 장소라고 설명하는 인물이다
인터스텔라는 블랙홀과 시공간의 과학적 개념을 다루는 SF 영화이다
